name: Infected Mode
description:
Infected treats an infected person who has infected others until there are no survivors left.

If you're a survivor, run from the infected or kill them.

If you're infected, try to infect as many people as possible.

WASD - Movement.
Left Click - Shoot.
Q - Grenade.
Mouse - Player Angle.
B - Open the Shop.
Esc - Pause.
R - Reload weapon.
